resources.string: We need to access your camera for scanning QR-codes. Please go to settings and allow access.
The camera is disabled according to the device\'s policies and cannot be opened.
The camera is removable and was disconnected from the Android device, or the camera service interrupted the connection due to a higher priority access request for the camera.
The camera is currently in an error state. The camera did not open as a result of any interaction unrelated to the user.
The camera is already in use.
The system-wide limit on the number of open cameras or camera resources has been reached, and no more cameras can be opened.

The camera is unavailable due to the Notification Manager policy. Some Android 9 devices cannot access the camera when the device is in Do Not Disturb mode. The camera will not be available until the Do Not Disturb mode is disabled.
We need to access your camera for scanning QR-codes. Please grant access.
